Question
========

Of 400 couples, the education level (1=low, 2=medium, 3=high) of husband and wife was determined and shown in the cross table below.

  ---------------------- --- ------------------------ ---- ---- Frequencies Education level of wife 1 2 3 Education level male 1 75 52 3 2 49 63 12 3 12 45 89 ---------------------- --- ------------------------ ---- ----

In this sample, what is the probability that the education level of the woman is medium, when it is given that her husband is lowly educated?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.13
* 0.33
* 0.36
* 0.4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.13: Incorrect
* 0.33: Incorrect
* 0.36: Incorrect
* 0.4: Correct
